_header: True love is large free and hende
_description:
Formerly listed as Boffey and Edwards (2005)
XJulia Boffey, and A. S. G. Edwards. A New Index of Middle English Verse. London: The British Library, 2005 6070 (following Wenzel (1974)
XWenzel, Siegfried. “Unrecorded Middle-English Verses.” Anglia 92 (1974): 55-78, but actually the second couplet of 5776.
